column1:
STAR Table Name: THORACIC_STAT1B
Variable Names in red font denote that field has important information in the Comment field

The data files created based on data as of 4/5/2024 will include data for registrations added and/or transplants occurring through 03/31/2024

column2: Patient is experiencing growth failure (Ped C)
Patient is less than 6 months old and does not meet the criteria for Status 1A (Ped B)
Requires infusion of a low-dose single inotrope (Ped A)
Infusion of inotropes but does not qualify for status 1A (Ped 1B criteria 1)
Less than 1 year old with hypertrophic or restrictive cardiomyopathy (Ped 1B criteria 2)
Does not meet criteria for Status 1B but has an urgency and potential for benefit comparable to other status 1A candidates   (Ped 1B exception)
Left and/or right ventricular assist device implanted (A)
Encrypted WLREG_AUDIT_ID For Linkage to Other Data
